channel.title: coding on Keisha S Perkins
channel.description: Recent content in coding on Keisha S Perkins

item.title: Up and Running With HUGO
item.description: I spoke at Baton Rouge Hack Night about my favorite static site generator, HUGO. Hugo is a great static site generator that's super fast and lightweight. This talk demos the steps for getting a site up and running, adding a few posts, and choosing a theme. I really recommend digging into the HUGO docs as well as the HUGO Community Forum for more in-depth explanations of how to use HUGO for your own site.

item.title: IT Girls: Build a JavaScript Infinite Runner
item.description: I developed this workshop for La-WIT annual IT Girls program. The workshop was meant to introduce area middle school girls to JavaScript using the p5.js library. The workshop has a workbook as well as an accompanying website. By the workbook’s end, you’ll have built a working game with JavaScript! .
